title: Must say Ekko's login music is great.
body:
Easy to leave it open while surfing the web. 

Makes up for having to log in twice.

replies.body:
Easy to leave it open while surfing the web.

Makes up for having to log in twice.

Must be an Ekko in here.

(Really sorry.)

well having taric login music would be the greatest of all am i rite guys ?...guys ? ah i forgot no juan likes taric...

cries in spanish  {{item:3070}} {{champion:44}} {{item:3070}}

You do not cry alone, friend. 

_Trigger warning for_ {{champion:412}} _players_!
http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/summoner/na/50335038/ranked-champions
Is this track in odd time signature - 11? And in the end the meter shifts or something. Very nice way to describe champion with time warping abilities {{champion:245}}
Yep! it's usually a combination of 6/4 and 5/4 with variations here and there

I've still gota get into that game. 

Steam library grows during sales and I just keep playing League.
My favorite part is the part in the middle where things quite down and there's this beautiful melody! <3 Rito Musician Senpais teach me how to make such great music!!!
